solution_line_template: The Heat won {heat_more_than_bulls} more games than the Bulls so they won {bulls_games_won} + {heat_more_than_bulls} = <<{heat_more_than_bulls}+{bulls_games_won}={heat_games_won}>>{heat_games_won} games.
The total games won together is {bulls_games_won}+{heat_games_won} = <<{bulls_games_won}+{heat_games_won}={total_games_won}>>{total_games_won} games.
